title: Sync backup?
content: So i was in prison for 5 years (2016-2021) and I had ab lot of bookmarks and login/passes. When I first got out I synced once, before reading and am scared I synced all my new stuff over my old ones.. I know you guys keep.sync ls.off site, but am I to.late???
creator: caspah

title: Cannot login email provider
content: I use outlook to merge my emails from several different providers. Due to a software update, I had to login and confirm the IMAP password of on particular email provider (web.de). Somehow this failed (both in outlook and directly at the web.de website via firefox), and I reset my password for this email. Firefox did not allow me to login directly into my mail on the web.de website, whereas I succeeded to do so in Safari. I updated the new password in outlook, all good. I turned off enhanced tracking protection, cleared all cookies and history, restarted the computer and still cannot login to web.de via firefox. Any ideas?
creator: rbollongino

title: Websites using Google fonts not displayed correctly
content:
When visiting websites that use Google fonts the fonts are not rendered/displayed correctly. I am using the latest version of Mozilla. I seached the internet for solutions and tried many gfx.font_rendering settings in the config but no result. Changing Sandbox security settings do not help either. Unselecting "Allow pages to choose their own fonts" in the settings works but this is not my preferred solution because this way all websites are displayed in the same fonts.

The attached images are from website https://onlinevideoconverter.com/ which is using the Raleway font. The image which is clearly readable if visited in Edge. The bad one is from Mozilla. Other browsers display the websites using google fonts correctly.

I would like to find a solution for this issue because I regularly visit news-sites that use google fonts and to read it properly I always have to switch to a different browser.
creator: sammyF

title: Your Firefox profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible
content:
I am having trouble to open firefox browser for ubuntu 20.04(focal). I have also delete mozilla folder from cache and then reinstalled again. I have tried to rename profileini file. Finally I have uninstall and install using terminal by "sudo apt install firefox" but still I am getting this error "Your Firefox profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible".

How to resolve this.

Thanks in advance.
creator: ms.sona.12

title: Youtube loads for a long time?
content: Youtube, sometimes, loads for ~5-10 seconds on average for no reason, doesn't load the video or audio at all. Extremely frustrating when I'm just browsing, it may not seem like a long amount of time but I shouldn't have these issues to begin with. Cleared cache, no addons are out of date or tamper with Youtube. Tried every fix I could find on the matter, nothing seems to have worked. Issue persists. I had similar issues with Kaspersky AV installed, so I had just uninstalled it. Prior to this newest firefox update, I have had no issues at all.
creator: kilsym
